prompts: Create a snake-like Pokemon that can blend into the grass with a purple and yellow color scheme.
I want a sneaky, serpentine creature that has shiny scales and can inflict poison on its enemies.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a snake, with a smooth body and a mischievous personality.
Make a vivid purple Pokemon with a curled body and sharp fangs, ready to strike.
Imagine a stealthy Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a knack for escaping.
Design a snake Pokemon that uses its agility to outmaneuver opponents in battle.
Show me a Pokemon that has a striking golden collar and a long, slithering body.
